name: Superhero Simulator
description:
In superhero Simulator you are super ragdoll and your goal is to save the people around town. The game was developed to fit game jolt's glitch jam, so all glitches are supposed to happen.

controls are down here:

  • space - get alttitude.
  • left mouse button or control - go forward.

right mouse button or alt - get a lot of alttitude( use if you get stuck or just for fun)

More games HERE!!

All songs by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
